alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms extending from the Oakley area to Pocatello area to the Driggs area will move northeast through 415 PM MDT... At 315 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Swan Valley to Bone to near Fort Hall Mount Putnam to near Rockland to 9 miles west of Oakley Reservoir. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph, half inch hail, moderate rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, Burley, Rupert, American Falls, Heyburn, Driggs, Swan Valley, Felt, Lake Walcott, Neeley, Chesterfield Reservoir, Goshen, American Falls Reservoir, Ririe Reservoir, Chubbuck, Aberdeen, Victor, Paul, Inkom, and Oakley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
